formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: The quantum tunneling probability is calculated using the formula: Probability = exp(-2 * √(2 * m * (V - E) * d) / ħ) where m is the particle mass, V is the barrier height, E is the particle energy, d is the barrier width, and ħ is the reduced Planck's constant.
